steps.description: Obtain Robe of the Lost Circle by either killing Brother Zephyl in Rathe Mountains or Brother Qwinn in South Karana.
Obtain Metal Pipe (Fi) by killing an iksar betrayer in Chardok.
Obtain Metal Pipe (Zan) by killing a drolvarg pawbuster in Karnor’s Castle.
Combine Robe of the Lost Circle, Metal Pipe (Fi), and Metal Pipe (Zan) in a container to create Robe of the Whistling Fists.
Obtain Charred Scale by killing Eejag in Lavastorm Mountains.
Obtain Immortals by killing named mobs in Skyfire Mountains.
Combine Robe of the Whistling Fists, Charred Scale, and Immortals in a container to create Demon Fangs.
Go to Trakanon's Teeth and find a mad Kaiaren. Give him Demon Fangs to receive Book of Celestial Fists.
Go to Trakanon's Teeth and find a sane Kaiaren. Give him Book of Celestial Fists to receive Celestial Fists.
